icp.application.classification

Class MLPClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.application.classification.ERPClassifierAdapter
      • icp.application.classification.MLPClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IERPClassifier

    public class MLPClassifier
extends ERPClassifierAdapter
    Classification based on multi-layer perceptron using Neuroph library
    Author:
    Lukas Vareka
